name: Bose SoundLink Revolve Bluetooth Speaker - Triple Black  | Dell USA
description: Deep. Loud. And immersive, too. The SoundLink Revolve Bluetooth speaker delivers true 360° sound for consistent, uniform coverage. Place it in the center of the room to give everyone the same experience. Or set it near a wall, so sound radiates and reflects. This wireless speaker is durable, water-resistant and easy to grab and go - with a rechargeable battery, that plays for long hours.
